channel.title: ichi special
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "ichi special" - does the ichi special ramen apply to the prize wheel?

item.title: Re: ichi special
item.content:encoded: I have not heard that before. That doesn't make it untrue, but I'd try and search around a bit more to find some more confirmation.

item.title: ichi special
item.content:encoded: i was checking my villages log and one of my m8s commented that by using the ichi special ramen bonus u can increase the chance of getting uncommon and up items on the prize wheel so i wanted to confirm if this was true or just a lucky shot while using the bonus(no pun intended)
